name: 3rd Annual Formulation & Drug Delivery Congress
content: Oxford Global are proud to present our 2017 3rd Annual Formulation & Drug Delivery Congress, taking place on 8 â€“ 9 May 2017 in May in London, UK. Over 300 delegates representing global pharmaceutical organisations, leading biotech companies and internationally renowned academic institutions will have the opportunity to discuss over 40 presentations and case studies focused on the key issues in large molecule and small molecule drug formulation and drug delivery. Including 4 interactive streams: Large Molecule Drug Formulation; Small Molecule Drug Delivery; Small Molecule Drug Formulation; and Large Molecule Drug Delivery. Download Agenda Now: http://bit.ly/1CBznbr. For further information regarding prices and possible discounts, please contact Guillaume Alonso on g.alonso@oxfordglobal.co.uk or call +44 (0)1865 248 455.
